summary: The Waste Isolation Pilot Plant in New Mexico is the nation's only repository for certain waste from nuclear weapons research and production. The facility is expected to run out of disposal space by 2025. The Department of Energy plans to expand it, but work may not be completed before existing space is full. title: Nuclear Waste Disposal: Better Planning Needed to Avoid Potential Disruptions at Waste Isolation Pilot Plant
